text: Yis Puvatɨzir Bretɨn Isam Damuamin Dughiabar faragha zuir aruemɨn, Judan gumazamiziba arazir kam iti. Me faragh God Israelia Gitazir Dughiam gɨnɨghnɨgh sipsipɨn igiam inigh God danighɨva an ofa damuam. Ezɨ Iesusɨn suren gumaziba an azara, “Nɨ danganir manamɨn God Israelia Gitazir Dughiamɨn isam amɨsɨ ifueghtɨ, e an mangɨ biziba akɨram?”
